CmdLine: mkdir -p /tmp/caddy &&     apk add --no-cache curl unzip &&     curl -sL -o /tmp/caddy/caddy_linux_amd64.tar.gz "https://caddyserver.com/download/linux/amd64?plugins=http.cors" &&     tar -zxf /tmp/caddy/caddy_linux_amd64.tar.gz -C /tmp/caddy &&     mv /tmp/caddy/caddy /usr/bin/ &&     chmod +x /usr/bin/caddy &&     rm -rf /tmp/caddy &&     curl -sL -o docker-gen-linux-amd64-$DOCKER_GEN_VERSION.tar.gz https://github.com/jwilder/docker-gen/releases/download/$DOCKER_GEN_VERSION/docker-gen-linux-amd64-$DOCKER_GEN_VERSION.tar.gz &&     tar -C /usr/local/bin -xvzf docker-gen-linux-amd64-$DOCKER_GEN_VERSION.tar.gz &&     rm /docker-gen-linux-amd64-$DOCKER_GEN_VERSION.tar.gz
Commands.Name: run
